ISSUE.TITLE: CSS file paths incorrectly generated when Nop is a Sub Application in IIS
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.80.0 Steps to reproduce the problem: Set Nop as a sub application in IIS NopHtmlHelper > GenerateCssFiles line 552 **result.AppendFormat("<link rel=\"stylesheet\" type=\"{0}\" href=\"{1}\" />",** MimeTypes.TextCss, route); should be: **result.AppendFormat("<link rel=\"stylesheet\" type=\"{0}\" href=\"{1}{2}\" />",** MimeTypes.TextCss, pathBase, route); cheers Mark

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7457 CSS file paths incorrectly generated when Nop is a Sub Application in IIS
